summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3344, for the improvement of 9th Avenue West, from West Galer Street to West Garfield Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41265 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
